description.diamond-pearl:
The user bites with
flame-cloaked fangs.
It may also make the
foe flinch or sustain
a burn.

a burn.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target and a separate $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target and a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
